name: aws-cms-serverless
description: This project implements a serverless backend for a simple cms management.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd ../serverless && NODE_ENV=test serverless offline start" "wait-on http://localhost:4000/dev && cd ../database && npm run start_test && ../tests && NODE_ENV=test jest && ../database && npm run end_test && ../tests"
